metadata.title: CVE-2016-4463 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Apache Xerces-C++ before 3.1.4 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service via a deeply nested DTD. It was discovered that Xerces-C XML Parser fails to successfully parse a DTD that is too deeply nested. An unauthenticated attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0+debian-2').
